text: Bertrand du Guesclin (c. 1320 â€“ 13 July 1380), was a French knight from Brittany who fought in the Hundred Years' War. He was Constable of France from 1370 to his death. He was important to the French successes in the war under Charles V of France. Category:1320 births Category:1380 deaths Category:Hundred Years' War Category:French military people Category:Knights
title: Bertrand du Guesclin
